name: Streadata.io API Gallery - UC Berkeley
description: This is a repository of uc berkeley APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: UC Berkeley
apis.description: Founded in 1868, the University of California, Berkeley is one of the worlds preeminent public universities, boasting a distinguished faculty (with 22 Nobel laureates to date), stellar research libraries, and more than 350 academic programs. At the he...
